translation.zh: 背后写着“杜克·格拉汉姆”

translation.en: and "die" on her chest.
translation.zh: 胸口写着“死”

translation.en: On the walls was written,
translation.zh: 墙上写着

translation.en: "Jim Smith next will die."
translation.zh: “吉姆·史密斯下一个死”

translation.en: And on the kitchen table was written,
translation.zh: 厨房台面上写着

translation.en: "Don't look fore us or ealse."
translation.zh: “别来找我们 否则要你好看”

translation.en: And "for" and "else" were both misspelled.
translation.zh: 其中写了两个错别字

translation.en: There was a palm print on the wall.
translation.zh: 墙上有个掌印

translation.en: And, before she was killed,
translation.zh: 在杀死黛比·卡特之前

translation.en: someone had raped Debbie Carter.
translation.zh: 有人强奸了她

translation.en: And evidently, it was like Grand Central Station over there,
translation.zh: 现场就像中央车站一样乱七八糟

translation.en: as far as police officers or a crime scene.
translation.zh: 警察和犯罪现场都是这样

translation.en: [Dan] Jim Smith and Duke Graham, both of them had alibis, and...
translation.zh: 吉姆·史密斯和杜克·格拉汉姆 两人都有不在场证明

translation.en: well, neither one of them gave statements that, that fit anything.
translation.zh: 他俩的证言也没什么发现

translation.en: And they just didn't have anything on either one of them.
translation.zh: 警方没有查到他俩任何问题

translation.en: Dennis Smith came in and immediately saw that he would need some help,
translation.zh:
丹尼斯·史密斯到场后
立刻发现自己需要协助

translation.en: so he called the Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigation.
translation.zh: 于是给俄克拉荷马州调查局打电话

translation.en: To help him with the crime scene.
translation.zh: 要求协助处理犯罪现场

translation.en: Gary Rogers, he was the OSBI agent,
translation.zh: 盖里·罗杰斯 是俄克拉荷马州调查局派来的探员

translation.en: which is Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigation.
translation.zh: 是俄克拉荷马州调查局派来的探员

translation.en: Gary had been a former, uh, police officer in Shawnee.
translation.zh: 盖里之前在肖尼当警察

translation.en: He was a rancher.
translation.zh: 也在农场干过

translation.en: And always wore a hat and boots,
translation.zh: 总是帽子、靴子、牛仔、皮带

translation.en: and jeans, and belt with a coat and tie.
translation.zh: 总是帽子、靴子、牛仔、皮带 穿着外套 系着领带

translation.en: [Dan] Dennis and Gary basically worked the crime scene.
translation.zh: 现场基本上是丹尼斯和盖里处理的

translation.en: They would funnel their reports to Bill Peterson,
translation.zh: 他们写报告交给比尔·彼得森

translation.en: who was the prosecutor of the case.
translation.zh: 他是本案的公诉人

translation.en: I've known Bill Peterson for all my life.
translation.zh: 我一辈子都和比尔·彼得森打交道

translation.en: He, uh, went to Ada High School.
translation.zh: 他上的艾达高中

translation.en: Um, he went to University of Oklahoma.
translation.zh: 俄克拉荷马大学毕业

translation.en: He did go through some prep schools back East.
translation.zh: 在东大上的预科

translation.en: His father was a doctor
translation.zh: 他父亲是医生

translation.en: and his mother was a, a member of the Norris family.
translation.zh: 他母亲是诺斯家族的成员

translation.en: I would say Bill was more of a folksy-type DA,
translation.zh: 在我看来 比尔是接地气的检察官

translation.en: where he would, uh, tell stories.
translation.zh: 他会说故事

translation.en: Which is a very effective way. When picking a jury
translation.zh:
其实是挺有效的方式 选择陪审员的时候
就是要接地气、讲故事

translation.en: is to be somewhat folksy and tell stories.
translation.zh:
选择陪审员的时候
就是要接地气、讲故事

translation.en: He could get angry. [sighs]
translation.zh: 他有时会发火

translation.en: I think we all feel the pressure to do what's right.
translation.zh: 我们都有要做好的压力

translation.en: And I know, since my nephew is a prosecutor,
translation.zh: 我侄子是检察官 我知道

translation.en: they have that kind of police mentality.
translation.zh: 他们有种警察思维

translation.en: They're prosecutors for a reason.
translation.zh: 他们当检察官是有意义的

translation.en: You're not going to make a lot of money in your life being a prosecutor.
translation.zh: 当检察官赚不了多少钱

translation.en: You like to put... bad people in jail.
translation.zh: 他们是想要把坏人关进监狱

translation.en: And protect your constituents. I believe that.
translation.zh: 保护选区的人民 我相信是的

translation.en: Somebody took some time to really stage that crime scene.
translation.zh: （本地女性被害 尚无一名嫌犯） 有人花时间布置了犯罪现场

translation.en: You know, most people panic and they leave,
translation.zh: 多数人会惊慌失措 然后离开

translation.en: and they leave all kinds of stuff. This...
translation.zh: 遗留下各种东西

translation.en: Whoever did this was really thinking about trying to create a diversion.
translation.zh: 而本案的罪犯 确实是在试图转移调查方向

translation.en: Dennis Smith had made a comment that before he retired...
translation.zh: 丹尼斯·史密斯说 在退休前

translation.en: that he would... solve Debbie's case.
translation.zh: 他会破掉黛比的案子

translation.en: When something like this happens to...
translation.zh: 家里或者镇上发生这种事

translation.en: your family or to the town, you know, it's the ripple effect.
translation.zh: 家里或者镇上发生这种事 会有涟漪效应

translation.en: I always like to say that it's like a tsunami.
translation.zh: 我总说 这就像一场海啸

translation.en: You know, you don't even recognize that it was coming.
translation.zh: 你都没意识到已经袭来

translation.en: It just takes everything away.
translation.zh: 它把一切都卷走了

translation.en: [Dawn] That was a huge shock.
translation.zh: 非常震惊

translation.en: You think, "Who was it? Somebody in this community?"
translation.zh: 你会想：“会是谁呢？社区里的人？”

translation.en: [Grisham] I'm sure it was, um... you know, terrifying in a small town like that.
translation.zh: 在这样的小城 这一定非常令人恐惧

translation.en: And then, um...
translation.zh: 之后 （约翰·格里森姆 作家）

translation.en: two or three years later, Denice Haraway disappeared.
translation.zh: 两三年之后 丹妮斯·哈拉维失踪了

translation.en: ♪ Sweet dreams of you ♪
translation.zh: （丹妮斯·哈拉维） （1984年4月28日）

translation.en: [woman] Denice worked at the little Quick Stop out on Highway One.
translation.zh: 丹妮斯在一号公路旁的便利店工作

translation.en: We were very concerned because Denice had disappeared,
translation.zh: 我们非常担心 因为丹妮斯失踪了

translation.en: and so the word spread quickly.
translation.zh: 消息很快传开了

translation.en: By the way, Denice worked for me for, um, a semester.
translation.zh:
顺便说一句
丹妮斯为我工作了一个学期 （比利·简·弗洛伊德
艾达历史学会会长）

translation.en: Part of a semester.
translation.zh: 学期中的一部分时间

translation.en: A real, sweet little girl,
translation.zh: 非常好的小女孩

translation.en: and she worked for me when she was in school,
translation.zh: 她为我工作过 当时她在东中央大学上学

translation.en: at East Central.
translation.zh: 当时她在东中央大学上学

translation.en: She was working as a work-study student.
translation.zh: 她当时勤工俭学

translation.en: Just as sweet as could be. Nice.
translation.zh: 人非常好

translation.en: Just a pretty little girl, you know, that was in college
translation.zh: 漂亮的小女孩 在上大学 需要一份工作

translation.en: and needed a job.
translation.zh: 在上大学 需要一份工作

translation.en: And I had an opening for a work-study student
translation.zh: 我有一个职位招勤工俭学的学生

translation.en: to be my secretary.
translation.zh: 做我的秘书

translation.en: The town was in disbelief, you know, at what had happened.
translation.zh: 镇上的人没法相信发生了这种事

translation.en: They would search out by Lawrence and out southwest of town.
translation.zh:
他们在劳伦斯镇搜查
再到镇外西南方向

translation.en: And there was all kinds of strange stories going around where they were looking.
translation.zh: 搜查的地方 各种奇怪的故事都在传

translation.en: Because, apparently, there was no rhyme or reason.
translation.zh: 因为这事情没道理

translation.en: I don't know what was happening. I just know that there were many rumors
translation.zh: 我不知道是怎么回事 只知道有很多传言

translation.en: about where she might be.
translation.zh: 关于她可能在哪里

translation.en: [Dan] On April 28th, 1984,
at about 8:30 at night, Denice Haraway was working in the, uh...
translation.zh:
夜里大概八点半 丹尼斯·哈拉维
正在艾达东边的便利店上班

translation.en: a little convenience store on the east side of Ada, Oklahoma,
translation.zh:
丹尼斯·哈拉维
正在艾达东边的便利店上班

translation.en: when Gene Whelchel and his two nephews were getting ready to go to a card game.
translation.zh:
吉恩·维尔切尔和他两个侄子
正打算去打牌

translation.en: And they stopped by the convenience store
translation.zh: 到了便利店

translation.en: to get some cigarettes and some change.
translation.zh: 买香烟 换点零钱

translation.en: They saw a man and a woman walk out
translation.zh: 他们看见一男一女走出来

translation.en: and get into the passenger side of a pickup and drive off.
translation.zh:
从乘客位置上了一辆皮卡
然后开走了

translation.en: So we stopped at, uh... McAnally's to get change for the poker game.
translation.zh:
我们开到麦安利便利店
换点零钱去打牌

translation.en: And I waited in the pickup.
translation.zh: 我坐在皮卡里等

translation.en: My nephew went inside, Lenny.
translation.zh: 我侄子兰尼走进店里

translation.en: And he came back out in a little bit and said there wasn't anybody in there.
translation.zh: 一会儿之后他出来 说里面没人

translation.en: We went in and kinda looked the place over. Discovered that--
translation.zh: 我们进去找了一圈 感觉不对劲

translation.en: Figured that something was wrong.
translation.zh: 感觉不对劲

translation.en: So we called the police.
translation.zh: 于是报了警

translation.en: [Dan] Money was taken out of their drawer.
translation.zh: 收银机里的钱被取走了

translation.en: Whoever was there made a quick grab for the money and obviously took the girl.
translation.zh: 歹徒迅速拿了钱 然后把女孩带走了

translation.en: Gene: I know it was her that left as we pulled up.
translation.zh: 我知道离开的就是她

translation.en: [Dan] They put an APB out for a faded, light blue pickup truck
translation.zh: 警方发出通缉令 寻找一辆褪色的浅蓝色皮卡

translation.en: with a straight bed, with gray primer spots on it.
translation.zh: 寻找一辆褪色的浅蓝色皮卡 底漆是灰色

translation.en: And they, uh, stopped a number of people, and developed information,
translation.zh: 警方拦下了一些人 查了一些信息

translation.en: but they didn't find the girl with any of that.
translation.zh: 但没有找到女孩

translation.en: Then, later on that night,
translation.zh: 当晚晚些时候

translation.en: they went to a store just down the street.
translation.zh: 警察去了街上另一家店

translation.en: J.P.'s
translation.zh: 杰比便利店

translation.en: And the, uh, clerk there, her name is Karen Wise.
translation.zh: 那里的店员名叫凯伦·怀斯

translation.en: She then reported that she saw a couple of people
translation.zh: 她说看到几个人

translation.en: that she felt were suspicious and she was worried about.
translation.zh: 她觉得可疑 有点担心

translation.en: They kind of scared her. They went into her store
translation.zh: 她有点害怕 几小时前来过她店里

translation.en: just a few hours earlier.
translation.zh: 几小时前来过她店里

translation.en: She is also the one that gave a composite sketch
translation.zh: 根据她的描述

translation.en: of the two guys that she thought was in her store that night.
translation.zh: 画出当晚去她店里的两人的图像

translation.en: They showed it to Gene Whelchel and he said that he thinks
translation.zh: 给吉恩·维尔切尔看 他说和自己看见的人挺像的

translation.en: that looks sort of like the guy that they saw.
translation.zh: 他说和自己看见的人挺像的

translation.en: Pretty soon, they published that composite
translation.zh: 警方很快将图像登在艾达的报纸上

translation.en: People started calling in. "I know a guy that looks like this.
translation.zh: 人们开始打电话来 “我认识一个人 长得挺像的”

translation.en: I know a guy." And all these names started pouring in.
translation.zh: “我认识一个人 长得挺像的” 得到很多人名

translation.en: A guy by the name of Billy Charley was identified.
translation.zh: 有人认出是比利·查理

translation.en: Billy Charley had an alibi. He was home with his parents that night.
translation.zh: 比利·查理有不在场证明 当晚他和父母一起在家里

translation.en: And then they started getting quite a few calls about Tommy Ward.
translation.zh: 后来接到不少关于汤米·沃德的电话

translation.en: Man 1: Okay, Tommy, I've got a few things I need to say first.
translation.zh:
（1984年10月18日
审讯汤米·沃德） 好的 汤米 我先说几句

translation.en: The date today is October 18th, 1984.
translation.zh: 今天是1984年10月18日

translation.en: We're at the headquarters office
translation.zh:
我们在俄克拉荷马州调查局
总部办公室

translation.en: of the Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigation located in Oklahoma City.
translation.zh:
我们在俄克拉荷马州调查局
总部办公室 在俄克拉荷马城

translation.en: I'm Deputy Inspector Rusty Featherstone.
translation.zh: 我是拉斯蒂·费瑟斯通副警司

translation.en: Present also in the room, is Special Agent Gary Rogers of the OSBI.
translation.zh: 房间里在场的还有盖里·罗杰斯探员 来自州调查局艾达办事处

translation.en: Out of the Ada office.
translation.zh: 来自州调查局艾达办事处

translation.en: Captain Dennis Smith
translation.zh: 丹尼斯·史密斯警监

translation.en: of the Ada Police Department, Detective Division.
translation.zh: 来自艾达警察局侦探处

translation.en: I know we've already talked about it a little bit,
translation.zh: 我们已经谈了一些

translation.en: but what I'd like you to do at this point, is just start on that afternoon,
translation.zh: 你现在需要做的是 从那天下午开始说

translation.en: and just in your own words, at your own speed,
translation.zh: 用你自己的话 按你自己的节奏

translation.en: I want you to go step by step through everything that happened
translation.zh: 把当晚发生的所有事情

translation.en: through the rest of that evening, involving this girl.
translation.zh: 一五一十说出来 包括女孩的事

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay.
translation.zh:
-好吗？
-好的

translation.en: Featherstone: Just go ahead and begin.
translation.zh: 开始说吧

translation.en: My name is Johnny Lee Daniels.
translation.zh: 我叫强尼·李·丹尼尔斯

translation.en: I've known Tommy Ward...
translation.zh:
我和汤米·沃德 （强尼·李·丹尼尔斯
汤米·沃德的朋友）

translation.en: since we were childhood kids.
translation.zh: 从小就认识

translation.en: Boy, we did a whole lot of running around on the back roads
translation.zh: 我们经常在后面的路上跑来跑去

translation.en: and drinking back in the day when we was young
translation.zh: 年轻时经常一起喝酒

translation.en: and didn't have no sense.
translation.zh: 什么都不懂

translation.en: He was just, um... a pretty quiet person in general.
translation.zh: 总的来说 他是个挺安静的人

translation.en: Can you tell me what her blouse looked like, that she was wearing?
translation.zh: 能不能告诉我 她穿什么样的内衣？

translation.en: It was...
translation.zh: 是…

translation.en: It was...
translation.zh: 是…

translation.en: white with little blue...
translation.zh: 白色 带蓝色…

translation.en: uh, roses on it.
translation.zh: 蓝色玫瑰

translation.en: White with blue roses.
translation.zh: 白色 带蓝色玫瑰

translation.en: [lady] At that point in time, you're kinda seen the downfall.
translation.zh: 当时 他几乎是垮了

translation.en: I didn't know if I was going to see him when he wasn't...
translation.zh:
我每次见到他 （特里西娅·沃尔夫
汤米·沃德的姐姐）

translation.en: on some kind of drugs or alcohol.
translation.zh: 不是吸了毒就是喝了酒

translation.en: He was a total different person.
translation.zh: 完全变了个人

translation.en: [man] Tommy had his run-in with the police.
translation.zh: 汤米和警察打过交道

translation.en: They looked at Tommy as a ruffian.
translation.zh: 警察把汤米看作是个恶棍

translation.en: A lower class person.
translation.zh: 低等人

translation.en: And the police didn't like him for some reason.
translation.zh:
（巴德·沃尔夫
汤米·沃德的姐夫） 警察因为某些原因不喜欢他

translation.en: I have no idea why.
translation.zh: 什么原因我不知道

translation.en: Unless it was just those things, you know? I mean, Tommy liked to drink.
translation.zh: 除非就是那些事 汤米喜欢喝酒

translation.en: I... I was at a... keg party.
translation.zh: 我参加一个啤酒派对

translation.en: And I ran into a couple of guys.
translation.zh: 碰到几个人

translation.en: Asked me if I wanted to go riding around with them and go get high,
translation.zh: 问我要不要一起开车逛逛 爽一下 喝点啤酒 我说没问题

translation.en: and drink some beer. And I told 'em, "Sure."
translation.zh: 爽一下 喝点啤酒 我说没问题

translation.en: My name is Robert Mayer.
translation.zh: 我叫罗伯特·迈尔

translation.en: I'm originally from New York City.
translation.zh: 我老家是纽约市

translation.en: When I graduated from college and journalism school,
translation.zh: 大学和新传学院毕业后

translation.en: I became a reporter.
translation.zh: 当了记者

translation.en: I had... no conception whatever, if these guys were guilty or innocent.
translation.zh: 对于他们是否有罪 我没有概念

translation.en: I thought, "Well, I'll look into it and see how far it goes."
translation.zh: 我想：“我会调查 看看是什么情况”

translation.en: And so that's how I got into the book that later became The Dreams of Ada.
translation.zh: 我就这么开始写《艾达之梦》

translation.en: And the confession of, "Was anybody else there?"
translation.zh: 招认的时候问：“还有没有别人在？”

translation.en: "Yeah, well, the ringleader, the guy who's idea it was,
translation.zh: 有的 罪魁祸首 出主意的就是他

translation.en: was Odell Titsworth."
translation.zh: 奥德尔·蒂茨沃思

translation.en: [Robert] And Odell Titsworth was this Indian fellow
translation.zh: 奥德尔·蒂茨沃思是个印第安人

translation.en: who uh, was known, had a reputation among the cops
translation.zh: 警察都认识他

translation.en: as a bad dude.
translation.zh: 知道他是坏人

translation.en: Titsworth, he grabbed money out of the register,
translation.zh: 蒂茨沃思从收银机里把钱拿走

translation.en: and we went out to the pickup.
translation.zh: 我们出去上了皮卡

translation.en: Featherstone: Where did you go from there?
translation.zh: 然后去了哪里？

translation.en: Out to the power plant.
translation.zh: 去了发电厂

translation.en: Featherstone: What did he say he was gonna do with her?
translation.zh: 他说会拿她怎么办？

translation.en: He told me that he was going to kill her.
translation.zh: 他说会杀掉她

translation.en: Now, the other person he had mentioned was... Carl Fontenot.
translation.zh: 他提到的另一个人是卡尔·方特诺特

translation.en: Featherstone: What was the purpose of taking her with you?
translation.zh: 你们把她带走的目的是什么？

translation.en: From the store?
translation.zh: 从店里带走

translation.en: To keep from her... coming to y'all and letting y'all know.
translation.zh: 防止她报警

translation.en: I mean, was that the plan, though, whenever you went there?
translation.zh: 你们去的时候就打算这么做吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-是的
-好的

translation.en: We had it all planned out, you know, to...
translation.zh: 我们都计划好的

translation.en: What were you planning on doing with her after you got her?
translation.zh: 抓住她后 你们打算怎么办？

translation.en: -Raping her. -Raping her and
translation.zh: 强奸她

translation.en: -then killing her and getting rid of her? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-先奸后杀 然后弃尸？
-是的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Johnny] Karl Fontenot I've known Karl Fontenot since we were little kids.
translation.zh: 我和卡尔·方特诺特从小就认识

translation.en: Karl... was a little slow when it come to his thinking.
translation.zh: 卡尔思维有点慢

translation.en: As we was going to McAnally's, we stopped there at the apartments,
translation.zh:
去麦安利便利店的路上
